mapper.sql: id, logistics_center_code, logistics_center_name, enable, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from logistics_center where del_flag=0
and logistics_center_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{logisticsCenterCode},'%'))
and logistics_center_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{logisticsCenterName},'%'))
and enable like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{enable},'%'))
and company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into logistics_center
id,
logistics_center_code,
logistics_center_name,
enable,
del_flag,
create_by,
create_time,
update_by,
update_time,
company_code,
company_name,

mapper.update:
update logistics_center
logistics_center_code = #{logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
logistics_center_name = #{logisticsCenterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update logistics_center set logistics_center_code = #{logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logistics_center_name = #{logisticsCenterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update logistics_center
logistics_center_name = #{logisticsCenterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where logistics_center_code = #{logisticsCenterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select
from logistics_center where del_flag=0 AND enable =1
and company_code = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by create_time desc
